text: The Nickel Ride is a 1974 American crime movie directed by Robert Mulligan and stars Jason Miller, Linda Haynes, Victor French, John Hillermann, Bo Hopkins, Harvey Gold. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1974 crime movies Category:American crime movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Robert Mulligan
title: The Nickel Ride
